contents.text: Dig deeper into the subject of this week’s cartoon:

China is overwhelmed, yet an even bigger covid wave may be coming (January 7th 2023)A wave of covid-19 reveals flaws in China’s health system (Dec 24th 2022)Our model shows that China’s covid death toll could be massive (Dec 17th 2022)
KAL’s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week’s here.
